content: hot tip of the day: if you go to definition in VSCode and realize you lost your place because you were in a temporary tab, you can go back with ctrl+alt+-
second hot tip: 'd' in zulip opens the 'drafts' menu
Ctrl+O by default in Vim/Neovim to go back in jumps :smile:
Also useful: Cmd+K (or I assume Ctrl+K for you non-mac users) will let you search all messages, filtered by various things like the sender, the stream, and the topic.
